My name is Josh Martin and I'm a Chicago-based Designer focused on Branding and UI/UX

Currently, I am freelancing full-time and building with @nononsensers. Previously, I was Creative Director @threadmeup and Lead UI/UX Engineer @suntimes.

A detailed list of my work experience (and proficiencies) can be seen on my Linkedin and Resume. For all other inquiries, I'm reachable via Email.
